page.title: 17Religion
page.content: {Religion} Churches in this area are either Anglican or Methodist. There is a parish church at Flockton and St.Luke's Parish church at Overton. The Methodist Churches at Netherton, Middlestown and Flockton are part of the Horbury and Ossett Circuit, but that at Midgely is a Barnsley Circuit. There was a Methodist Church at Overton but this closed through lack of support. St.Luke's Church used to be in Middlestown but a new building was erected at Overton. There have also been extensive additions to the Sunday School at Netherton Trinity Methodist Church, Over Â£20,000 being spent on the extentions ( new classroom, improvement of Kitchen and toilet facilities and relaying the car park).
